title: Listen to some songs(聽一些歌曲
author: KEI727
txt_content:
本帖最后由 KEI727 于 2011-8-28 15:49 编辑 

Pale kid raps fast typography
O hai(哦嗨
i'm that guy(我就是那傢伙
built so fly in a silk bow tie(弄了個會飛的領帶
don't know why i'm built so fly(我不知道為什麼,只因為是我弄的所以飛了起來
but i am, no lie(但我沒有說謊
oh my(真是的
rolled by on a low ride Huffy(滾在那發怒的矮馬
sitting on the pegs, shelltoes puffy(坐在釘子上,腳趾浮腫
cuff rolled up to my calf(袖口捲起到我的小腿
class out the ass(課堂外的屁股
bad with the swag like buffy(壞的贓物，像巴菲
Gotta be the one to bite the bullet(總得是忍辱負重
i'm sinner but i bet I coulda been a better man(我是罪人，但我敢打賭，我是一個更好的男人
I wanna be zen. but I go sipping on some medicine(我想成為禪宗。但我去吸毒
instead of meditating but I get when i can(沉思，但我希望得到的時候我可以
I don't wanna wind up in the gutter with a bottle of malt-(我不想在陰溝裡風帶一瓶麥芽
liquor, bitter cause i never got a call(酒，苦，因為我從未有一個電話
telling me(告訴我
that it's all(它的所有
figured out(想通了
i'm sick of doubt(我生病的疑問
but i'm looking at the wall(但我看著牆上
part of me was hoping to be caught up in( 我是希望能趕上一部分
the moment and to be open to the good and the God in me(當下,在我的上帝公開向好
but i got a labotomy and i get that I oughtta(但我得到了襯衫，我得到祝福
become a bit of an oddity when somebody gets (成為怪胎，當有人得到
offended by the thought of me(得罪了我的思想
who's he? you gotta be kidding me(他是誰？我是在開玩笑
do me like Gabourey Sidibe(我喜歡
if you see me with a chickadee(如果你看到我與山雀
no diggity it'll be giggity giggity giggity(沒有 diggity這將是giggity giggity giggity{像聲字}
gonna send it like a letter from above(要去給它像一個從上面的信
with a woman that I love(一個女人，我愛
cause I get it like i live(因為我想獲得它，我活著
but if my baby's gay I'll say you go gay baby, work that crib!
work that bib
burp that kid
screw po-lice
flip that car
i don't want a Jesus piece
but i want a Reece's Piece and a Kit Kat Bar
I want everybody focusing on getting me to Letterman 
to kick it for the betterment of innocent Americans 
who never want to settle for their pop
Or not--
my bedroom rocks
and the beat still knocks
when I sort my socks
i'm five foot eleven of sex from the tip of my head to my gorgeous knees









what song you listen?(你聽什麼歌？
